Translations.Text: Ut. L. M. S
Hoc scripture habet revealed vos - Vos non harbor doubt it in tuus heart - Ut vos warn it provisus reminder believers
Vos shall totus subsequentis quod revealed vos tuus Dominus; non subsequentis any idols Eum! Rarely perfecit vos take heed
Multus community nos annihilated they incurred noster retribution dum they est asleep wide awake
Their utterance when noster retribution advenit them est Indeed nos est transgressors
Nos certainly question those received message nos question messengers
Nos inform them authoritatively nos est nunquam absent
scales est set on ut feria equitably. Those weights est heavy est winners
Prout pro those weights est light they est unus lost their anima consequence de disregarding noster revelations unjustly
Nos established vos terra nos habet provisus pro vos means support therein! Rarely est vos appreciative
Nos created vos tunc nos shaped vos tunc nos dictus to angels, Fall prostrate Adam. They fell prostrate absque Iblees (Satan;) he non est prostrators
He dictus Quod prevented vos ex prostrating when ego ordered vos? He dictus ego est bene than he; Vos created me ex fire created eum ex mud
He dictus Ergo vos iit down vos non est est arrogant hic. Get vos debased
He dictus Grant me respite Feria Resurrection
He dictus Vos granted respite
He dictus Abinde Vos habet willed ut ego iit astray ego skulk them Tuus straight path
Ego advenit them ex them behind them ex their rectus ex their sinister Vos invenit ut multus de them est unappreciative
He dictus Get therefrom despised defeated Those among them subsequentis vos ego fill Hell vos totus
Prout pro vos Adam dwell tuus uxor in Paradise eat therefrom vos please non approach hoc 1 tree lest vos fall in sin
devil whispered them in order reveal their corporis est invisible to them. He dictus Tuus Dominus non forbid vos hoc tree prevent vos ex becoming angels attaining eternal existence
He juravit them ego dedit vos bonus advice

He SIC duped them lies Prout soon prout they tasted tree their corporis became visible to them they tried cover sinister Paradise! Their Dominus alias them ego non enjoin vos Perfecit ex ut tree warn vos devil est tuus ardent enemy
They dictus Noster Dominus nos wronged noster anima ac Vos forgive nos habet mercy nos nos est losers
He dictus Iit down enemies de 1 alias On terra est tuus habitation provision pro awhile
He dictus it vos vivens it vos abiit ex it vos est brought out
O infans Adam nos provisus vos garments cover tuus corporis alias prout pro luxury! Bene garment est garment righteousness. These est some de deus signum ut they take heed

O infans Adam non let devil dupe vos prout he perfecit when he causa eviction tuus parentes Paradise removal their garments expose their corporis. He his gens vide vos, dum vos non vide them. Nos appoint devils companions de those non believe
They commit gross sin tunc dictus Nos invenit nos parentes perfecit hoc DEUS commanded nos perfecit it Dictus DEUS nunquam advocates sin Vos dictus DEUS quod vos non know
Dictus My Dominus advocates justice stand devoted to Eum alone omnis locus worship Vos devote tuus worship absolutely Eum alone Just prout He initiated vos vos ultimately iit Eum
Some He guided dum others committed straying They taken devils their magister DEUS they believe ut they guided
